SELECT NOTI_CODE , NOTI_NAME , NOTI_CONTENT , BSNS_CATE , IFNULL( (SELECT CDDT_NAME FROM SYS_CODE_DETAIL WHERE CDDT_VAL = BSNS_CATE ), '전체' ) AS BSNS_CATE_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS NOTI_REG_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS NOTI_MOD_DATE , NOTI_MOD_USER , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM DF_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = NOTI_MOD_USER ) AS NOTI_MOD_USER_NAME FROM SYS_NOTI_INFO
AND (BSNS_CATE = #{bsns_cate} OR BSNS_CATE IS NULL OR BSNS_CATE = '')
AND ${keyword_column} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY NOTI_REG_DATE DESC

SELECT NOTI_CODE , NOTI_NAME , NOTI_CONTENT , BSNS_CATE , (SELECT CDDT_NAME FROM SYS_CODE_DETAIL WHERE CDDT_VAL = BSNS_CATE ) AS BSNS_CATE_NAME , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_REG_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS NOTI_REG_DATE , DATE_FORMAT(NOTI_MOD_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS NOTI_MOD_DATE , NOTI_MOD_USER , (SELECT USER_NAME FROM DF_USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = NOTI_MOD_USER ) AS NOTI_MOD_USER_NAME FROM SYS_NOTI_INFO
AND NOTI_CODE = #{noti_code}
